c74object.name: fl.makestring~
c74object.digest: Creates a tagged string by concatenating strings and numbers.
c74object.description: Items for concatenatation are set as parameter and can be altered dynamically. Numeric inputs are indicated as in1 to inx (where x is the number of inputs created). Only a single number is read from each input, interpreted as an integer. Numbers can be optionally zero-padded. The number of items to concatenate can be set explicitly by parameter. Alternatively, it can be set implicitly by the item parameters present at instantiation.

entry.name: 3. /trigger_ins [instantiation variable length bool array]
entry.description:
Sets which inputs trigger output using an array of bools.
By default all inputs trigger output.

entry.name: 4. /padding [variable length int array]
entry.description:
Sets the zero padding for each input using an array of integers.
By default there is no zero padding.

entry.name: 5. /item_01 [string]
entry.description: Sets the string or input for item 1.
